name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clutch Scraper - Extract Business Database from Clutch.co

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape clutch.co B2B leads. Extract the company name, page URL, ratings, social links and more from Clutch.co listing page link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clutch Scraper helps you easily export company information from Clutch.co. Perfect for sales teams, business development, and market research professionals.

KEY FEATURES:
• Export up to 100,000 leads
• Get verified company contact information
• Export formats: CSV, Excel, and JSON
• Smart rate limiting to avoid blocks
• Bulk export capabilities

AVAILABLE DATA FIELDS:
• Company Details: Name, logo, description, website
• Contact Information: Phone numbers, social media profiles
• Business Metrics: Project size, rates, employee count
• Location Data: Complete address information
• Verification Status: Clutch verified and premier status
• Reviews & Ratings: Review count, rating values

PERFECT FOR:
• Sales Teams: Build targeted prospect lists
• Lead Generation: Get verified B2B contact information
• Business Development: Find and connect with potential partners
• Market Research: Analyze companies and competitors
• Sales Operations: Automate data collection process

HOW IT WORKS:
1. Install the extension
2. Search for your target potential clients on Clutch.co
3. Copy the listing URL and start to export leads

MORE LEAD GENERATION TOOLS
Check out our Tools menu to discover more business lead generation tools that can help streamline your workflow.

DATA PRIVACY
Your privacy is our priority. All data is processed locally on your computer and never passes through our web servers, ensuring complete confidentiality of your export activities.

Save hours of manual work and streamline your lead generation process with Clutch Scraper.

Support: help@niomaker.com

DISCLAIMER
Clutch Scraper is not endorsed by or affiliated with Clutch.co. Clutch is a trademark of its respective owner.
